code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Rooms=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://json-server-9-3i2g.onrender.com/rooms").then(res=>{if(!res.ok){throw new Error("Failed to fetch data");}return res.json();}).then(data=>{setData(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(error=>{setError(error.message);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rooms-container",style:{backgroundImage:"url(https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1548437983-5d3c209764a1?w=500&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxleHBsb3JlLWZlZWR8MTl8fHxlbnwwfHx8fHw%3D"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:data.map(room=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/Golden_hub/booking",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:room.image,className:"card-img-top",alt:"Room"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:room.Room_type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Bed size: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{children:room.Bed_Base})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Price $",room.Price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Book Now"})]})]})})},room.id))})});};export default Rooms;
